crypto_workshop

Class Cryptographer

  • java.lang.Object
    • crypto_workshop.Cryptographer

  • public class Cryptographer
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of basic encryption methods in Java. Implemented for the CryptoWorkshop of the SSK-Stiftung 2015-09-05
    Author:
    jhermes
